2010-08-01

30 Days of Buffy: Day 27 - Cutest moment

Lots of cute moments ... and lots of them probably involve Oz because, well he was really cute (and of course cool because you can be both)

So here's my favourite as of today from Bewitched, Bothered and Bewildered...

BUFFY: I seem to be having a slight case of nudity here.
OZ: But you're not a rat. So call it an upside.
